title: Two men, A and B, can paint a house in 8 days. A alone can paint the house in 12 days. How long will B take to paint the house by himself? - Quora

response.answer_text: If A can paint the house in 12 days he paints 1/12 of the house per day. In 8 days he therefore paints 8/12 or 2/3 of the house, meaning in the same time B painted 1/3 of the house. A paints twice as fast as B, 2/3 of the house to 1/3 of the house. Therefore, it would take B twice 12 days or 24 days to paint the house himself.
Total Work = 8*12 = 96 A →12 Days 1 Day = 96/12 = 8 Units A& B →8 Days 1 Day = 96/8 = 12 Units 1 Day → A alone 8 A&B 12 so B alone 4 B Time → 96/4 = 24 Days
